summary: A wrapper around a pretrained Data2Vec audio model that adapts it for sequence classification, handling input processing, producing class logits, and offering utilities to lock various parts of the network during fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Provide an easy‑to‑use component for building audio classification solutions that leverage state‑of‑the‑art self‑supervised representations, reducing development time and computational cost while allowing controlled fine‑tuning.
